entry.title: Incantation Spell Casting Elixir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Alchemy - Manifestation - Expression - Grounding - Uplifting - Energizing - Focus

You cast spells with every word you speak. This magickal elixir is made with sacred plants and embodies the energies of the four directions - water, earth, fire, and air. Being in touch with these elements within you connects you to the cosmos, aligns you with your truth, and empowers you to cast your spells and manifest your vision.

Chakra: Throat
Name: Vishuddha (“especially pure”)
Planet: Mercury
Tarot: The Magician
Element: Sound
Purpose: Communication and creativity
Basic Right: To speak and be heard
Demon: Lies
Identity: Creative
Orientation: Self-expression
Mantra: My words create my world

Benefits

  • Enhances concentration
  • Improves memory
  • Purifies mind and speech
  • Elevates mood
  • Support creative self-expression and clear communication
  • Helps to align words and actions with heart for a strong voice
  • Provides guidance and protection during spell work
  • Creates a ceremonial space to manifest your vision
  • Courage speaking up and expressing your truth
  • Alleviates cough and sore throats
  • Open Throat Chakra

Ingredients

Thyme (Thymus vulgaris), Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis), Black Sage (Salvia mellifera), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Honey

Suggested Use

Suggested Use: 2-3 dropperfuls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

Ritual: Take a moment to arrive and breathe deeply to settle into your body and engage your senses. When you cast spells, all levels of consciousness must be engaged. As you take the elixir, feel the spirits of the plants within you, empowering every cell in your body. Fill your lungs with air and speak out, calling in and manifesting your dreams.

entry.title: High Priestess Meditation + Divination Ally
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wild Return
Type: Tinctures
Price: 35.00

Grounding- Uplifting - Calming - Focus - Intuition - Trust - Guidance

This magical potion will help you tune into the vibration of your third eye, opening you up to divine guidance while strengthening your psychic powers. Its bitter flavor heals stagnation and calms the nervous system - our greatest asset as witches. Use it as a tool for tapping into your intuition with deep trust and reverence to the wisdom of spirit.

Chakra: Third Eye
Name: Ajna (“to perceive and command”)
Planet: Moon
Tarot: High Priestess, The Moon, The Star
Element: Light
Purpose: Pattern recognition
Basic Right: To see
Demon: Illusion
Identity: Archetypal
Orientation: Self-reflection
Mantra: I see clearly and I’m open to the wisdom from within

Benefits

  • Increases psychic abilities
  • Moves energy to heal stagnation
  • Calms nerves and melts tension
  • Enhances lucid dreaming and dream recall
  • Consciousness shifting
  • Divine guidance
  • Breaking patterns of illusion
  • Connection to the moon
  • Opens Third Eye Chakra

    Ingredients

    Mugwort Leaf (Artemisia vulgaris), Blue Vervain Flowers (Verbena hastata), Blue Lotus Leaf (Nymphaea caerulea), Organic Cane Alcohol, Spring Water, Glycerin

    Suggested Use

    Suggested Use: 2 dropperfuls as needed. Can be added to water, tea, or drink of choice.

    Ritual: Create a sacred space where you will be able to sit comfortably and turn inward. Sip your potion slowly. Let each sip bring you into a deeper state of receptivity. Pull a Tarot card or use your favourite tool for divination to guide you in between worlds. Trust the messages you receive.

entry.title: Yoga Mat Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taurah
Type: Yoga Mat Spray
Price: 22.00

The Classic Taurah natural cleanser works wonders for your yoga mat and at-home workout equipment. The 60 ml spray bottle is filled with a natural formula which is based with organic witch hazel, and natural essential oils, with the fresh smell of citrus.

Ingredients

Distilled Water, Witch Hazel, Essential Oil Blend (Lemongrass, Thyme, Rosemary, Wild Orange, Grapefruit, Bergamot)

Store in a cool, dry place. We encourage a shelf life of 12 months.

entry.title: Classic Taurah Set - Yoga Mat Spray, Microfibre Towel & Carry Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taurah
Type: Yoga Mat Spray
Price: 32.00

An all-natural formulation is intentionally created to cleanse your yoga mat!

The set includes the citrus smelling 60 ml natural yoga mat spray, exclusive marble micro-fibre towel and carrying case.

Ingredients

Distilled Water, Organic Witch Hazel, Essential Oil Blend (Lemongrass, Thyme, Rosemary, Wild Orange, Grapefruit, Bergamot)

Store in a cool, dry place. Shelf life of 12 months.
